module.sqlWrap: SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM TrendLiked WHERE (PassportId=@PassportId) ORDER BY LikedId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM TrendLiked WHERE (TrendId=@TrendId) AND (LikedId > @MaxId) ORDER BY LikedId DESC
SELECT Top (@Top) * FROM TrendLiked WHERE (TrendId=@TrendId) AND (LikedId < @MinId) ORDER BY LikedId DESC
SELECT * FROM TrendLiked WHERE TrendId IN (@TrendIds) ORDER BY LikedId DESC
SELECT TrendId FROM TrendLiked WHERE (PassportId=@PassportId) AND (TrendId IN (@TrendIds))
DELETE FROM TrendLiked WHERE TrendId=@TrendId AND PassportId=@PassportId; UPDATE TrendCount SET LikedCount=(select count(1) from TrendLiked where TrendId=@TrendId) WHERE TrendId=@TrendId;
